blog.title: 4 Arizona Dog Laws That Every Dog Owner Should Know About
blog.content: Depending on the time of year, temperatures in Arizona can climb into the triple digits for months on end. If you’re a pup parent of a long-haired dog who’s concerned about the comfort of your friend, you may have wondered: Should I shave my dog?
